results.title: Surviving the Game - Making The Hunger Games: Catching Fire
results.original_title: Surviving the Game - Making The Hunger Games: Catching Fire
results.overview: Documentary film about the making of The Hunger Games: Catching Fire.

results.title: Firequake
results.overview: Promethean Kinetics has created Helios, a revolutionary clean coal energy source so powerful it rivals the force of the sun and will solve the energy crisis. But when certain governments start cutting safety measures required by Helios, the highly-explosive product begins to seep deep below the Earth's crust, producing giant blasts of fire and violent earthquakes above the surface. As cities shake and oceans boil, Eve Adams, creator of the Helios technology, rushes to investigate the subterranean phenomenon. As the situation becomes ever more dire, she is the only one who can save mankind, not to mention reputation.

results.title: Firehouse Dog
results.overview: Rexxx, Hollywood's top canine star, gets lost and is adopted into a shabby firehouse. He teams up with a young kid to get the station back on its feet.

results.title: The Snow Queen 3: Fire and Ice
results.overview: After heroically defeating both the Snow Queen and the Snow King, Gerda still cannot find peace. Her dream is to find her parents who were once taken away from them by the North Wind and finally reunite the family. Thus, Gerda and her friends embark on an exiting journey to find her parents and encounter new challenges along the way: they discover an ancient magical artifact of the trolls, the Stone of Fire and Ice. From that moment on, things don't go according to the initial plan...Will Gerda be able to tame the mighty forces of the magical elements and get her family back? The answer will be reveled in 2016. This is a story which encompasses everything you love about Wizart: kindness, bravery, friendship, mystery, love of one's family, and a happy ending, of course!

results.title: Zatôichi Goes to the Fire Festival
results.overview: Zatoichi is mentored by the blind leader of a secret organization as he contends with both the Yakuza and a jealous husband.

results.title: A Woman and Her Four Men
results.overview: An epic tale set at the turn of the 20th century in a struggling fishing community, following the life of a woman widowed at the beginning of the film.

results.title: Firestorm
results.overview: In the year 2024, a fierce battle rages between a ruthless villain and an android resistance group

results.title: Fireball
results.overview: Inspector Ava Williams investigates a prison fire to its source, a prisoner seeking revenge against those who put him behind bars.

results.title: Fireworks
results.overview: Fireworks revolves around a young man (played by Anger himself) associating with various navy sailors, who eventually turn on him, stripping him naked and beating him to death, ripping open his chest to find a clock ticking inside. Several fireworks then explode, accompanied by a burning Christmas tree and the final shot shows the young man lying in bed next to another topless man.

results.title: Dollar Of Fire
results.overview: Western drama of the fight of a sheriff against a band of thugs led by a rich banker.  Source: SWDB www.spaghetii-western.net

results.title: The Brief Lifespan of Fire, Act 2, Scene 2: Suring and the Kuk-ok
results.overview: The short film tells the myth of Suring, who casts a spell of immense beauty but is still judged by humanity. She retreats to the forests where she is far from the prying eyes of humans, and there, she befriends the Kuk-ok, a creature who can transform into any form.

results.title: Fired Up!
results.overview: 2 Guys. 300 Girls. You Do the Math. The two most popular guys in high school decide to ditch football camp for cheerleader camp. For the girls and for the glory.

results.title: The Fire That Burns
results.original_title: La ville dont le prince est un enfant
results.overview: Two boys in their early teens in a strictly-run pre-WWII Catholic School form a firm friendship which is troubled by an abbot who is obsessed with the younger of the students.

results.title: What to Do in Case of Fire?
results.overview: What To Do In Case of Fire? tells the humorous and touching story of six former creative anarchists who lived as house squatters in Berlin during its heyday in the 80s when Berlin was still an island in the middle of the former eastern Germany. At the end of the 80s they went their separate ways with the exception of Tim and Hotte, who have remained true to their ideals and continue to fight the issues they did as a group. In 2000, with Berlin as Germany's new capital, an event happens forcing the group out of existential reason to reunite and, ultimately, come to grips with the reason they separated 12 years ago.

results.title: Dragon Ball: Goku's Fire Fighting Regiment
results.original_title: Doragon bôru: Gokû no shôbô-tai - ドラゴンボール悟空の消防隊
results.overview: It's a ten minute video, which aired in Japan in June 1988, features Goku and his friends as firefighters, explain how to deal with fire.

results.title: God Answers by Fire - Elijah and the Prophets of Baal
results.original_title: God Answers by Fire - Elijah and the Prophets of Baal
results.overview: When God wants to start a movement, He never raises up a committee, He raises up a leader. 1 Kings 17 - 18 records the preparation of Elijah to be the leader God needed at the time. From Mount Carmel you can have a breath taking view of Israel from the Mediterranean Sea in the west to Mount Hermon in the north and the Jordan River in the east. All the different elements of the story of Elijah and the Baal prophets can be visualized, including the brook Kishon, where the priests of Baal were slain

results.title: Firepower
results.overview: A mercenary is hired by the FBI to track down a powerful recluse criminal, a woman is also trying to track him down for her own personal vendetta.

results.title: Earth Wind Fire Experience feat. Al McKay - AVO Session Basel 2011
results.original_title: Earth Wind Fire Experience feat. Al McKay - AVO Session Basel 2011
results.overview: Earth Wind Fire Experience featuring Al McKay, AVO Session Basel 2011
